briefTitle: Mechanisms, Predictors, and Social Determinants of Cardiotoxicity in Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Cardiotoxicity of Cancer Therapy 2: Mechanisms, Predictors, and Social Determinants of Health in Breast Cancer Patients Treated with Doxorubicin And/or Trastuzumab
conditions: Breast Cancer, Cardiotoxicity, Drug-Related Side Effects and Adverse Reactions, Cardiovascular Diseases
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Change in Left Ventricular Ejection Fraction (LVEF)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women older than 18 years of age
* Breast cancer with treatment plan that includes doxorubicin and/or trastuzumab
* Ability to provide written informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* Pregnancy at enrollment
* Inability or unwillingness to provide consent
